ygData.subject: RE: Dumb bards (was:Magical Gloves?)
ygData.msgSnippet: But once the chain hit it last for 3 ticks, so you can used other songs. You do not have to constantly tried it.  if it fail then I would understand you trying
ygData.messageBody:
But once the chain hit it last for 3 ticks, so you can used other songs.
You do not have to constantly tried it. if it fail then I would understand
you trying it again but if it is successful use one other song at least.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe


-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Kuenster (Entex) [mailto:v-ntxck@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 4:00 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dumb bards (was:Magical Gloves?)


From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>

Well there are excuses to play only one at a time, but only a few. I will
often only play Chain when my primary function is to slow a mob for my
casters to Kite. If I am consistently Chaining without fail then I will
twist in a Fear or a Bellow between Chains, but if your fighting large red
mobs like Griffins and Hill Giants slowing them is the primary function and
takes precedence over anything else.

-----Original Message-----
From: CMai [mailto:CMai@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 10:27 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dumb bards (was:Magical Gloves?)


From: CMai <CMai@...>

I know what you mean. I do not understand how a lvl 24 bard not know the
usefullness of playing multisongs. Last night I was group with a bard and 4
other plp. This bard is a lvl 24. She will play Bellow while fighting only
then Hymn after battle. I asked her that she know that we can play 3 song
at a time right and she said yeah and that was it. When I started playing
my Anthem, Psalm, and healing during battle the group was so impress. They
were like wow you can play 3 songs at a time? I was like yes. I told them
that if they ever group with a bard expect at least 2 songs at a time.
There is no excuse not to play more than 1 song.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
